主要活動於[[維基百科|維基百科]]的[https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/User:だ＊ぜ だ＊ぜ]{{block|記得開VPN :P}} }} === 異なる言語の自我紹介 === {{Navbox with collapsible groups |group1 = English |list1 = The words and behaviours of this user are all based on the logic from natural and compassion. |group2 = Deutsch |list2 =  Die Worte und Verhaltensweisen dieses Benutzers basieren alle auf der Logik aus Natur und Mitgefühl. |group3 = 深理文 |list3 = 是君者 基之自然之道與惻隱之心而言行也 |group4 = 白話文 |list4 = 此用戶皆為由自然法則所得之邏輯與同情之心，而發表些許言論或做出些許舉動。 |group5 = 浅理文 |list5 = 此用户都是根据由自然法则所得出的逻辑和同情心，而发表一些言论或做出一些举动。 |group6 = 日本語 |list6 = このユーザーは自然の論理と思いやりの心で基準として喋りや行動しています。 }} == モットー == {{Cquote|I know nothing except the fact of my ignorance.|By Socrates}} {{Cquote|There is no absolute in the world, only relative. Everything has its meaning, the unknown does not equal to not exist. When we have eliminated the impossibles, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.|''By だ＊ぜ''}} {{Cquote|Discrimination can be divided into 2 kinds: #''The one who is discriminated by others did do something which is hated by others, so that other people discriminated that one;'' #''The one who discriminates others is a knowledgeless redneck, because of his ignorance, he/she would discriminate others.'' ''If you discriminate others, which kind is it?''|''By だ＊ぜ''}}
